content:
Intro:

* Explanation of what the product is and what it does
* Explanation of the different roles within the product (admin, tagger, checker)
* Overview of the key features and functionalities of the product

Getting Started:

* Step-by-step guide on how to log in to the product
* Explanation of the different screens available in the product (dataset screen, task management screen, specific task screen, annotation tool)

Flows:

Admin:

* Creating a dataset: Explanation of how to upload a dataset and manage its metadata (e.g. dataset name, description, etc.)
* Task Management: Explanation of how to create tasks, assign users (tagger and checker), and view the progress of tasks
* Changing Task Status: Explanation of how to change the status of a task (e.g. from "Not Started" to "In Progress")
* Assigning Users: Explanation of how to assign taggers and checkers to specific tasks

Tagger:

* Viewing Tasks: Explanation of how to view the tasks assigned to the tagger
* Annotating Documents: Explanation of how to annotate documents and save the annotations
* Changing Document Status: Explanation of how to change the status of a document (e.g. from "Not Started" to "In Progress")

Checker:

* Viewing Tasks: Explanation of how to view the tasks assigned to the checker
* Verifying Annotations: Explanation of how to verify the annotations made by the tagger
* Changing Document Status: Explanation of how to change the status of a document (e.g. from "In Progress" to "Ready for Review")

Videos:

* Creating a Task: A video showing how to create a task, assign users, and change its status
* Annotating Documents: A video showing how to annotate documents and save the annotations
* Verifying Annotations: A video showing how to verify annotations made by the tagger
* Changing Document Status: A video showing how to change the status of a document

Notes:

* Emphasize the importance of accurately annotating and verifying the annotations
* Provide tips for efficiently using the product
* Mention any limitations or restrictions of the product
* Encourage users to provide feedback for future improvements.
